page.title: 19Fishing _ near Fetcham.
page.content: On the River Mole near Fetcham there are lots of places to fish, e.g. "The Splash" off River Lane. The fish you can catch include trout, chub, roach, rudd, tench, bream and gudgeon. Maggots and bread are usually use as bait. The best techniques to use are float fishing and ledgering. There is a fishing club called the Leatherhead District Angling Society which controls most of the river in the Leatherhead area. Rods cost from 10 to 100 pounds. The local fishing shop (Aburns of Ashtead) is now closing down so you have to go to Tompkins of Dorking for fishing gear. Fishing may appear to be very boring but in fact is extremely interesting. It is a very good hobby.
